content:
Indie game developer based in Katowice, Poland. Currently making a roguelike game with RTS elements. If you are interested, feel free to contact us or give us a follow!
Your subscription could not be saved. Please try again.Thank you!üó°Ô∏èReavers of the Underkeepüèπ
If you want to join the Reavers of the Underkeep mailing list to receive updates about game development or be notified when the Steam page goes live, enter your email below.
We send about one email a month, and you can unsubscribe at any time.
Enter your email<div class="entry__field"><input class="input " type="text" id="EMAIL" name="EMAIL" autocomplete="off" placeholder="EMAIL" data-required="true" required /></div></div><label class="entry__error entry__error--primary" style="font-size:16px; text-align:left; font-family:Helvetica, sans-serif; color:#661d1d; background-color:#ffeded; border-radius:3px; border-color:#ff4949;"></label></div></div></div><div style="padding: 8px 0;"><div class="sib-form-block" style="text-align: center"><button class="sib-form-block__button sib-form-block__button-with-loader" style="font-size:16px; text-align:center; font-weight:700; font-family:&quot;Lucida Grande&quot;, sans-serif; color:#FFFFFF; background-color:#bd052e; border-radius:3px; border-width:0px;" form="sib-form" type="submit"><svg class="icon clickable__icon progress-indicator__icon sib-hide-loader-icon" viewBox="0 0 512 512" style=""><path d="M460.116 373.846l-20.823-12.022c-5.541-3.199-7.54-10.159-4.663-15.874 30.137-59.886 28.343-131.652-5.386-189.946-33.641-58.394-94.896-95.833-161.827-99.676C261.028 55.961 256 50.751 256 44.352V20.309c0-6.904 5.808-12.337 12.703-11.982 83.556 4.306 160.163 50.864 202.11 123.677 42.063 72.696 44.079 162.316 6.031 236.832-3.14 6.148-10.75 8.461-16.728 5.01z" /></svg>SUBSCRIBE</button></div></div><input type="text" name="email_address_check" value="" class="input--hidden"><input type="hidden" name="locale" value="en"></form></div>
